fn.p: DMS, CZ, ACK, ALPM, PFW, JB and CNDS conceived and designed the study; DMS, CZ, ACK, ALPM, AHDC, DK, PFW, JB and CNDS wrote the manuscript; CZ performed the virus isolation procedures; NCA amplified the ZIKV genome, and HF performed the sequencing; DMS, CZ, ACK, AHDC, DK and PFW carried out the experiments; DMS and ALPM analysed and compared the ZIKV genomes; ALPM performed the phylogenetic analyses. All authors read and approved the final manuscript. The authors declare no conflicts of interest.
